name: Run Away (itch) (Louan Costa)
description:
Run Away is a prototype of an escape game made in the setting of the jam Ludum Dare 49 in October 2021 ( https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/49/run-away  ). 
I made this prototype alone.

Description :

The player's goal in this prototype called "Run Away" is to find the great portal to escape from the labyrinth.
If the enemies catch the player, he looses. 
But be aware ! There are portals which are connected and which will teleport you somewhere else in the labyrinth. Don't confuse the portals !

Controls :

Install Instructions : 

- Download here the folder Run_Away_Protoype_by_LouanCosta.rar
- Unzip the folder Run_Away_Protoype_by_LouanCosta.rar 
- Open the folder WindowsNoEditor
- Execute the application TEST_UNREAL4_ESCAPE.exe

Prototype developed on Unreal Engine 4.

Prototype made by Louan Costa, Game Designer.
